nafziger.title: The Nafziger Collection of Orders of Battle & TO&E (WWII 1939-1945 COMPLETE)
nafziger.author: George F. Nafziger
nafziger.coverage: COMPLETE WWII 1939-1945 Orders of Battle AND Table of Organization & Equipment documents. OOB FILES: Afrika Korps (daily tank strengths, unit returns), British 8th Army (division-level OOBs), Italian divisions (Ariete, Trieste, Brescia, etc.), Operations (Compass, Battleaxe, Crusader, Gazala, El Alamein, Tunisia, Sicily, D-Day), Commonwealth forces (Indian, Australian, NZ, South African), US forces (Tunisia, Italy, Normandy), Eastern Front, Pacific Theater. TO&E FILES: German Authorized Strength (KStN) documents (410 files, 1943-1945), German Organization Studies (462 files, 1939-1945), US Detailed Organization (121 files, 1943-1944), British Organization (9 files, 1944)
nafziger.notes: PRIMARY OOB & TO&E SOURCE - Donated to US Army CARL in 2010. Contains 10,049 files including 205 North Africa-specific OOBs (1940-1943) and 872 TO&E templates (1939-1945). OOBs break down to regimental/battalion level with rare daily strength returns. TO&E documents show authorized unit structures for validation and gap-filling. Use OOBs for definitive snapshots at specific dates. Use TO&Es for structural validation and equipment distribution calculations. Collection downloaded 2025-10-13.
